summary: After an Afghanistan-born woman who lives in Canada receives a letter from her suicidal sister, she takes a perilous journey through Afghanistan to try to find her.
cast: Ike Ogut|Nelofer Pazira|Hassan Tantai|Sadou Teymouri|Hoyatala Hakimi|Monica Hankievich|Noam Morgensztern|Zahra Shafahi|Safdar Shodjai|Mollazaher Teymouri
title: Kandahar
